item.title: Git Rebase
item.description: Rebase is used in merging two or more commits into one. Per experience, you can only rebase to an older commit. Say, in these commits 1~$ git log -2 --pretty=oneline 2a0dd6b55000399c5f8b5f0f55286e167725e51c2 (HEAD -> v0.2.x_wip, origin/v0.2.x_wip) docktie_cli getx: Tested working implementation for #17. 3fb8f1de0cf1af7b447dfc9275878c516384f3a0d docktie_cli getx: initial implementation wip for #17 Older one is fb8f1de0cf1af7b447dfc9275878c516384f3a0d Run: 1~$ git rebase --interactive HEAD~2 You'll be in an interactive mode (in an editor) 1pick fb8f1de docktie_cli getx: Implementation for #17.
